page.title: 07Marden Nature Trail,Wilts.
page.content: This trail is two miles long and is open from April to September every year. It is part of the railway track that once ran from Chippenham to Calne.The line was closed under the Beeching Plan,and the land was sold back to the original owners. Dogs are not allowed on the trail, which you can get onto at Studley Bridge,off the A4 road at Norley Lane. There are 150 different plants to be seen on the Nature Trail and 24 sorts of grasses. There are 3 types of rush,3 kinds of sedges,and 25 types of trees and shrubs.
